lead_paragraph: PASDADENA, Calif. - Oregon's 26-17 loss to Ohio State on Friday in the Rose Bowl is sure to especially sting Chip Kelly, the Ducks' first-year coach.
snippet: Ohio State stifled the Ducks and quarterback Jeremiah Masoli in the Rose Bowl.
abstract: Ohio State stifled the Ducks and quarterback Jeremiah Masoli in the Rose Bowl.
